post.body:
We are working hard on Khatoon, an original series produced by Ali Asadzadeh and directed by Tina Pakravan.
Happening in Allies invaded Persia, this series tells the dramatical/historical story of a family, Khatoon tells the story of a woman who like many other Persian women in that period had to fight for her life.
Our team is creating a lot of environmental models for 3D set extensions, 3D animations, FX, and a huge amount of matte paintings for Khatoon.

<YouTube youTubeId="zRFeqYsqX5c" />
